LanguageData.PlasteelSternum.label: plasteel sternum
LanguageData.PlasteelClavicle.label: plasteel clavicle
LanguageData.PlasteelHumerus.label: plasteel humerus
LanguageData.PlasteelRadius.label: plasteel radius
LanguageData.PlasteelFemur.label: plasteel femur
LanguageData.PlasteelTibia.label: plasteel tibia
LanguageData.SimpleProstheticSternum.label: prosthetic sternum
LanguageData.SimpleProstheticSternum.description: A sternum prosthesis. It is inferior to a real sternum.
LanguageData.SimpleProstheticClavicle.label: prosthetic clavicle
LanguageData.SimpleProstheticClavicle.description: A clavicle prosthesis. It is inferior to a real clavicle.
LanguageData.SimpleProstheticHumerus.label: prosthetic humerus
LanguageData.SimpleProstheticHumerus.description: A humerus prosthesis. It is inferior to a real humerus.
LanguageData.SimpleProstheticRadius.label: prosthetic radius
LanguageData.SimpleProstheticRadius.description: A radius prosthesis. It is inferior to a real radius.
LanguageData.SimpleProstheticFemur.label: prosthetic femur
LanguageData.SimpleProstheticFemur.description: A femur prosthesis. It is inferior to a real femur.
LanguageData.SimpleProstheticTibia.label: prosthetic tibia
LanguageData.SimpleProstheticTibia.description: A tibia prosthesis. It is inferior to a real tibia.
LanguageData.ArchotechInternalSupport.label: archotech internal support
LanguageData.ArchotechInternalSupport.description: An artificial internal support built by an archotech. Useful replacement to have on hand for when an internal component of an archotech prosthesis breaks.
LanguageData.ArchotechArm.label: archotech arm
LanguageData.ArchotechArm.description: An artifical arm built by an archotech. It's strong enough to crush a thick hardwood branch in its hand, and precise enough to write a sonnet on a grain of rice. It looks and feels like natural flesh, but it's harder to damage than plasteel. Even if it is harmed, it repairs itself over time. Its internal workings are a mystery to all human minds.
LanguageData.ArchotechForearm.label: archotech forearm
LanguageData.ArchotechForearm.description: An artifical forearm built by an archotech. It's strong enough to crush a thick hardwood branch in its hand, and precise enough to write a sonnet on a grain of rice. It looks and feels like natural flesh, but it's harder to damage than plasteel. Even if it is harmed, it repairs itself over time. Its internal workings are a mystery to all human minds.
LanguageData.ArchotechHand.label: archotech hand
LanguageData.ArchotechHand.description: An artifical hand built by an archotech. It looks and feels like natural hand, but it's harder to damage than plasteel. Even if it is harmed, it repairs itself over time. Requires archotech surgery research to install it.
LanguageData.ArchotechFinger.label: archotech finger
LanguageData.ArchotechFinger.description: An artifical finger built by an archotech. It looks and feels like natural finger, but it's harder to damage than plasteel. Even if it is harmed, it repairs itself over time. Requires archotech surgery research to install it.
LanguageData.ArchotechLeg.label: archotech leg
LanguageData.ArchotechLeg.description: An artifical leg built by an archotech. It looks and feels like natural flesh, but a pair of these can move the user as fast as a decent car, and it's harder to damage than plasteel. Even if it is harmed, it repairs itself over time. Its internal workings are a mystery to all human minds.
LanguageData.ArchotechFoot.label: archotech foot
LanguageData.ArchotechFoot.description: An artifical foot built by an archotech. It looks and feels like natural foot, but it's harder to damage than plasteel. Even if it is harmed, it repairs itself over time. Requires archotech surgery research to install it.
LanguageData.ArchotechToe.label: archotech toe
LanguageData.ArchotechToe.description: An artifical toe built by an archotech. It looks and feels like a natural toe, but it's harder to damage than plasteel. Even if it is harmed, it repairs itself over time. Requires archotech surgery research to install it.
LanguageData.BionicInternalSupport.label: bionic internal support
LanguageData.BionicInternalSupport.description: An advanced artificial internal support. Useful replacement to have on hand for when an internal component of a bionic prosthesis breaks.
LanguageData.BionicArm.label: bionic arm
LanguageData.BionicArm.description: An advanced artificial arm. Silenced mini-servos give great strength, while the biogel nerve-link gives exquisite control. A lattice-dust healing system allows it to recover from damage. It is better than a biological arm in almost every way.
LanguageData.BionicForearm.label: bionic forearm
LanguageData.BionicForearm.description: An advanced artificial forearm. Silenced mini-servos give great strength, while the biogel nerve-link gives exquisite control. A lattice-dust healing system allows it to recover from damage. It is better than a biological arm in almost every way.
LanguageData.BionicHand.label: bionic hand
LanguageData.BionicHand.description: An advanced artificial hand. With its biogel nerve-link and lattice-dust healing system, it is better than a biological hand in almost every way.
LanguageData.BionicFinger.label: bionic finger
LanguageData.BionicFinger.description: An advanced artificial finger. With its biogel nerve-link and lattice-dust healing system, it is better than a biological finger in almost every way.
LanguageData.BionicLeg.label: bionic leg
LanguageData.BionicLeg.description: An advanced artificial leg. With its biogel nerve-link, powerful mini-servos, and lattice-dust healing system, it is better than a biological leg in almost every way.
LanguageData.BionicFoot.label: bionic foot
LanguageData.BionicFoot.description: An advanced artificial foot. With its biogel nerve-link and lattice-dust healing system, it is better than a biological foot in almost every way.
LanguageData.BionicToe.label: bionic toe
LanguageData.BionicToe.description: An advanced artificial toe. With its biogel nerve-link and lattice-dust healing system, it is better than a biological toe in almost every way.
LanguageData.SimpleProstheticArm.label: prosthetic arm
LanguageData.SimpleProstheticArm.description: An arm prosthesis. While it lacks a neural interface, its complex arrangement of internal joints allows it to mimic natural movement quite convincingly. Still, it is inferior to a real arm.
LanguageData.SimpleProstheticForearm.label: prosthetic forearm
LanguageData.SimpleProstheticForearm.description: A forearm prosthesis. While it lacks a neural interface, its complex arrangement of internal joints allows it to mimic natural movement quite convincingly. Still, it is inferior to a real forearm.
LanguageData.SimpleProstheticHand.label: prosthetic hand
LanguageData.SimpleProstheticHand.description: A hand prosthesis. While it lacks a neural interface, its complex arrangement of internal joints allows it to mimic natural movement quite convincingly. Still, it is inferior to a real hand.
LanguageData.SimpleProstheticFinger.label: prosthetic finger
LanguageData.SimpleProstheticFinger.description: A finger prosthesis. While it lacks a neural interface, its complex arrangement of internal joints allows it to mimic natural movement quite convincingly. Still, it is inferior to a real finger.
LanguageData.SimpleProstheticLeg.label: prosthetic leg
LanguageData.SimpleProstheticLeg.description: A leg prosthesis. While it lacks a neural interface, its complex arrangement of internal joints allows it to mimic natural movement quite convincingly. Still, it is inferior to a real leg.
LanguageData.SimpleProstheticFoot.label: prosthetic foot
LanguageData.SimpleProstheticFoot.description: A foot prosthesis. While it lacks a neural interface, its complex arrangement of internal joints allows it to mimic natural movement quite convincingly. Still, it is inferior to a real foot.
LanguageData.SimpleProstheticToe.label: prosthetic toe
LanguageData.SimpleProstheticToe.description: A toe prosthesis. While it lacks a neural interface, its complex arrangement of internal joints allows it to mimic natural movement quite convincingly. Still, it is inferior to a real toe.
LanguageData.RangedPlatformModule.label: ranged platform module
LanguageData.RangedPlatformModule.description: An advanced ranged platform module. With stabilizer and targeting system can give your pawn great accuracy and improve your pawn's ranged combat ability.
LanguageData.MeleePlatformModule.label: melee platform module
LanguageData.MeleePlatformModule.description: An advanced melee platform module. With sensory motor and targeting system can give your pawn great melee damage and improve your pawn's melee combat ability.
LanguageData.PowerClaw.label: power claw module
LanguageData.PowerClaw.description: A combat-oriented hand module that adds hooked claws on each of its fingers. It cuts deep, and it improves strength enough to crush a skull like a hand crushes an egg. The claws can be retracted, to not impede non-combat tasks, however its overall ungainlyness slows down movement slightly.
LanguageData.ModuleEfficiency.label: advanced processing module
LanguageData.ModuleEfficiency.description: Extra processing power to optimize and boost the performance of a bionic prosthesis. It will improve the efficiency of the part it is installed on and of any connected bionics.
LanguageData.CraftingToolsModule.label: crafting tools module
LanguageData.CraftingToolsModule.description: A crafting tools module. Provides screwdrivers, shears, welders and other miniaturized mechanical tools to help with smithing, producing items and building. The tools can be retracted to allow normal functionality of the part, however its overall ungainlyness slows down movement slightly.
